name: unstemizer
description: `unstemizer` allows you to access each part of a [Stems](http://www.stems-music.com/) file. A Stems file is a music format that contains four ‘stems’: Drums, Bassline, Melody, and Vocal stems. This format allows DJs to control each track independently.
author: Thai Pangsakulyanont <org.yi.dttvb@gmail.com> (http://dt.in.th/)
